access: Characters from Geb have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Palanquin of Night](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1799)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 178</row>

**Price** 825 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L when not activated
</row>

**Access** Characters from Geb have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small square of dark blue fabric appears to be painted with a depiction of the night sky, shifting each day to match the sky above Geb the previous night.

<document level="2" id="action-1461" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
